body: Isn’t the MC for this the MC for negative Love M? https://nhentai.net/g/121118/ another girl likes him and he gets wither but he makes her sleep with other guys because he’s jaded and doesn’t believe she’ll still love him after he makes her do awful things. But she comes back right away and still loves him. And it helps him heal. If you’re looking for that series, just search Negative love and first 2 chapters are translated and the third chapter is still untranslated and in the tankouban.
Great ending. But TBH, the mc is a bit retarded as well, at least he knew when to walk out from a shit.
Well, definitely a big F for MC, and now I missed the game
You know what? this bitch totally deserve the AIDS she gets for being this stupid!

Was honestly kinda hoping the ending would be her regretting it and wishing she hadn't strayed like she did. But either way, this is really out of character lol, she literally said it'd be the end of her in she was cheated on in the game, I doubt she'd just fuck a rando.

Same here serrakura and kingslum hope keep swimming til you drown to hell bitch o and like i said before take that fucked up manager with you to hell as well as his family and the writer of this negative fucked up life of a manga
